column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Food : large and tender shrimp cocktail. We have found that having both is at times
column2: a challenge to find. Freshly baked sourdough bread. Filet and ribeye
column3: sides of the greatest brussel sprouts Ive ever had
column4: loaded baked potato and then chocolate creampie. All fantastic and I have nothing to add as far as what could have been improved with the food! The best!
